[From Pookpunt & Ongsakul (2013).
Also used by Pillai et al. (2018), personal communication.]

8 m/s		12 m/s		17 m/s
0–360	0.0042	0–270	0.0084	0–270	0.0112
		280	0.0107	280	0.0135
		290	0.0126	290	0.0163
		300	0.0149	300	0.0191
		310	0.0149	310	0.0302
		320	0.0195	320	0.0358
		330	0.0149	330	0.0307
		340	0.0149	340	0.0191
		350	0.0126	350	0.0163
		360	0.0102	360	0.0135
